thread.title: Early Bird Walk at Wellfleet Bay
thread.title_full: Early Bird Walk at Wellfleet Bay

title: Early Bird Walk at Wellfleet Bay
text: Description Experience the best of morning bird activity with a Wellfleet Bay naturalist on this walk along sanctuary trails. From pine woodlands and a freshwater pond to salt marsh and beach, the site's diverse natural communities offer diverse bird sightings. This walk is a great introduction to the birds of Cape Cod and appropriate for birders of all levels. Binoculars are welcome but not required. Checking registration status. When - Fri, Jul 19, 2024 8:00 am - 10:00 am Who Adults Cost - Adult Members $18 - Adult Nonmembers $22 Where Location: Wellfleet Bay Wildlife Sanctuary, South Wellfleet - Questions? Contact us: - [508-349-2615](tel:508-349-2615) [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#b8cfddd4d4ded4ddddccf8d5d9cbcbd9cddccddad7d696d7cadf) Instructors - Mass Audubon Staff Instructions Please dress for the weather and wear comfortable walking shoes. Bring binoculars if you have them. Please arrive and check-in 10 minutes before the start of the program. This program includes sanctuary admission for the remainder of the day.
